The world would come to a standstill as the internet has become an integral part of our lives, and without it, communication, commerce, and entertainment would be severely impacted.
The loss of the internet would have a profound impact on the global economy, as many businesses rely on online platforms for sales, marketing, and communication.
The internet has revolutionized the way we access and share information, and without it, scientific research and innovation could come to a halt.
The internet has also made it possible for people to work and learn remotely, and without it, this would not be possible, leading to a loss of jobs and opportunities.
The internet has become a platform for social and political activism, and without it, these movements could be severely hindered, leading to a loss of political and social progress.
